course.name: Parsa Rajabi Khoury Coll of Comp Sciences Sandbox

assignment.name: Tell me an English Joke
assignment.description:
Write one original joke in English. The joke should be appropriate for a general audience (school setting), and it can be in any format you choose, such as a one-liner, pun, knock-knock joke, or a short situational joke.

The joke should be creative, well-structured, and easy to understand.

Example of Joke Types:

  1. One-liner:
    "Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts."

  2. Pun-based:
    "I’m reading a book on anti-gravity. It’s impossible to put down!"

  3. Knock-Knock:
    "Knock-knock.
    Who’s there?
    Lettuce.
    Lettuce who?
    Lettuce in, it’s cold out here!"

  4. Situational Joke:
    "A perfectionist walked into a bar… apparently, it wasn’t set high enough."

Submission Guidelines:

  • The joke must be original—not copied from any external source (books, internet, etc.).
  • The joke should be brief (maximum of 2-3 sentences).
  • Be sure to avoid any offensive or inappropriate content. The humor should be light and inclusive.
